subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
lead_paragraph: Ali Farokhmanesh, the son of an 1980 Iranian Olympic volleyball player, is finally getting a chance to enjoy the fruits of his, and his father’s, labors.
snippet: Ali Farokhmanesh, the son of an 1980 Iranian Olympic volleyball player, is finally getting a chance to enjoy the fruits of his, and his father’s, labors.
